response.original_title: Ex-Husband Step Aside: Lady Boss Returns
response.overview: When Callie is abandoned and betrayed by her wealthy husband, Andrew, amid a devastating disaster, her world collapses-only to rise stronger from the ruins. After surviving a near-fatal scheme by her husband's manipulative confidante, Justine, Callie boldly chooses divorce and embarks on a journey of self-rediscovery. As she rebuilds her life and career, Callie's hidden talents flourish, unveiling her true identity as a formidable architect and heiress. Facing corporate sabotage, ruthless rivals, and emotional entanglements, Callie transforms into an unbreakable force, leaving those who wronged her desperately seeking redemption.
response.title: Ex-Husband Step Aside: Lady Boss Returns
